comments.text:
Created attachment 567001
Sketch.PNG

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I am gonna open many tabbed windows at the same time and I would like see all tabs at the same time to find information


Actual results:

I could not find any tool to do that


Expected results:

If it is possible to arrange all tabs like the attached sketch file, It would be very useful and also the user interface of browser web should be in 3D as now a day, the 3D tachnology is supported in most computers and application.
